page.title: 04TWO SENIOR CITIZENS
page.content:
SENIOR CITIZEN 1 has lived in Stanmore for 35 years. She intends to retire to Ipswich. Although she likes the area she thinks it too noisy. She is also worried that the streets are unsafe and inadequate for traffic. She would like to see a supermarket nearby to improve the shopping.
SENIOR CITIZEN 2 has lived in Stanmore for 21 years. She likes its village atmosphere. She thinks the only amenity lacking is a library. She worries about overcrowding and the amount of building. She also feels public transport is inadequate. Her final words were that she would like to "combat the building".{ { BOTH of them would like to see a shopping centre for pensioners and more entertainment for young people.
